DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify a safe and tolerable dose of the drug KU-0059436 that can be given in combination with carboplatin and/or Paclitaxel chemotherapy
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of a PARP Inhibitor in Combination With Carboplatin and/or Paclitaxel
DOC.criteria: Male or female patients with a histologically or cytologically diagnosed malignant solid tumour Adequate bone marrow, hepatic and renal function Performance status of no more than 2 ( ECOG scale). Any chemotherapy, radiotherapy ( except palliative), endocrine or immunotherapy within 4 weeks prior to entry Major surgery with 4 weeks of entering the study and must have recovered from effects of the major surgery More than two previous courses of platinumcontaining chemotherapy Heavily pretreated patients(> 2 courses of previous chemotherapy and/or extensive irradiation leading to bone marrow deficiency) will be excluded from the study
